allow: Bash(# Check if blastn is available and test it which blastn && echo ""blastn found"" || echo ""blastn not found"" # Try running NCBI BLAST self-comparison on the test file if command -v blastn &>/dev/null; then time blastn -task blastn -query /tmp/test_11bit.fasta -subject /tmp/test_11bit.fasta -outfmt 6 -out /tmp/ncbi_test.out 2>&1)
Bash(sort -u echo "=== Coordinates in LOSAT only ===" comm -23 /tmp/losat_coords.txt /tmp/ncbi_coords.txt)
Bash(# Get details of LOSAT-only hits echo ""=== LOSAT-only hits \(sample with scores\) ==="" comm -23 /tmp/losat_coords.txt /tmp/ncbi_coords.txt head -5 /tmp/losat_only.txt)
Bash(head -1 done echo "" echo "=== NCBI-only hits \(sample with scores\) ===" comm -13 /tmp/losat_coords.txt /tmp/ncbi_coords.txt head -5 /tmp/ncbi_only.txt)
